tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Let's Play Worms
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Geoff, Gavin, Ray, and Michael go to war in Worms for the Xbox Live Arcade. Naughty names are forbidden.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: I wonder if anyone caught the﻿ Yu-Gi-Oh reference.
Geoff's laugh cures cancer, Ray's laugh﻿ cures aids, they should open a hospital
you dont think so?﻿

Most people only enjoy those qualities when THEY are exhibiting them. I don't like Gav for those reasons but I watch almost every vid he and Michael are in, just waiting for Michael to﻿ snap and kill him.
RAY﻿ the forbidin one.
who﻿ else loves geoff's laugh?
Michael is the﻿ Broniest.
yeah but it was way too crazy for me to recognize﻿ which was which
imma a fag﻿ and i like DICK!!!
Lol﻿ I also do that every time
They love him really. Believe it or not, Mike and Gav are best﻿ mates. If you listen to the podcast they always go swimming together with Lindsay, Michael's girlfriend.
im just watching all their﻿ lets plays till they bring out the new minecraft
god i love gavin﻿
Are people still so retarded as to think they actually hate﻿ gavin?
imma a fag﻿ and i like﻿ DICK!!!
its funny.... that they all know that those names were porn﻿ star names
ya﻿ you do
One minute in, 'ah this'll be nostalgic and funny for a couple of﻿ minutes'....FORTY minutes later...'that was AWESOME!!'
look up the slo mo guys, Gavin is a﻿ cool guy
LOL same :D﻿
Awe...﻿ poor Gavin... <3Gavin XD 3:19am and I'm still watching ur guys videos... what a life XD
Is Michael﻿ a Brony?
This is hands down the funniest roosterteeth video I have ever seen.﻿

Reviewer.Books: anything my story book like dday and spy smuggler
Reviewer.Job: school but want join the army
Reviewer.Movies: saving privet ryan,enamy at the gate,saint and soldier
Reviewer.Music: anythink eminem or canadian love manafest he rocks fav song is no plan b

Reviewer.Books: Pretty much the Harry Potter and Twilight books. Everyone knows. I really don't read but i do type up my own stories. Like the Anime I'm working on now. Doesn't have an official title but it might be a hit some time.
Reviewer.Job: I'm a Certified Nursing Assistant. Just got my licence and a job. Old people are so cute. Well, not all.
Reviewer.Movies: I love watching Anime, if you couldn't tell from my channel ^.^IDKY i like Anime so much.. I guess you can say that it's fun to dream on how Anime could be real in reality... Just imagin that we could make faces and have little spirts floating above our head. Wouldn't that be cool? Well... I guess i'm just a dreamer.
Reviewer.Music: Good kind, like the songs on my channel and on my Ipod. I can't really pick a fav. cause it eventually becomes a song 'I haven't heard in a long time'.
